paper_abstract: This paper presents a combined feature extraction method to improve the performance of bag-of-features image classification. We apply 10 relevant operations to global/local statistics of visual words. Because the pairwise combination of visual words is large, we apply feature selection methods including fisher discriminant criterion and LI-SVM. The effectiveness of the proposed method is confirmed through the experiment.
paper_title: Extraction of Combined Features from Global/Local Statistics of Visual Words Using Relevant Operations
